column1: The Pit Room////Came here because it had great reviews
column2: but super sorry we wasted $100 in this restaurant. Had the brisket and it was so salty and had a funky texture. Mac and cheese lacked any flavor. The Beans were so over spicy
column3: you couldn't enjoy them. 4 of us ate here
column4: and not one of us liked our food or said we'd come back. Sorry Pit Room
column5: need to step up your game a few notches
column6: you lost a few customers here.
